fwdpy11 recipes Kevin R Thornton 2021-01-17 1 Preface This book provides additional recipes for the fwdpy11 simulation software. The recipes complement examples found in the primary documentation. Some recipes may be repeated here. The book is written using R Markdown. The Python code blocks are executed via reticulate. The book is always current with respect to the current fwdpy11 release. The contents of this book are generated using fwdpy11 version 0.12.0.
2 Introduction 2.1 Key imports The following imports will be used throughout: import fwdpy11 import numpy as np import seaborn as sns import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
